title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid details.

steps.description: Navigate to user registration page
Input valid registration data including role selection
Submit registration form
Check registration success message is displayed
Verify that user account is created in the database

title: User Login with Role-Based Access
description: Verify that user login succeeds with valid credentials and correct role-based modules are accessible.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username and password
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and landing on dashboard
Verify accessible modules based on user role (Admin, Sales Executive, Field Agent)

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username and/or password
Click login button
Check error message indicating login failure
Ensure user is not redirected to dashboard

title: Dashboard Displays Real-Time Metrics and Forecasts
description: Verify the dashboard loads accurate real-time data and sales forecasts under varying data loads.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive
Navigate to dashboard
Check display of real-time sales metrics with correct values
Verify sales forecasting charts render correctly and update dynamically
Simulate high data load and verify dashboard performance and correctness
Ensure no data inconsistencies or crashes under load

title: Add New Vehicle to Inventory with VIN Decoding
description: Verify that new vehicle entry form accepts VIN, decodes vehicle details automatically, and saves inventory record with uploaded documents.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive
Navigate to Inventory Management module
Start new vehicle addition flow
Input valid VIN number
Check vehicle details are auto-populated from VIN decoding
Upload required vehicle documents in multipart format
Submit new vehicle entry
Verify new vehicle is added to inventory with correct details and documents

title: Add Used Car Purchase with Document Upload
description: Verify used vehicle purchase flow allowing data input, document uploads, and inventory update.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive
Navigate to Inventory Management -> Used Car Section
Enter vehicle and seller information
Upload purchase-related documents
Submit used car purchase form
Vehicle record is created with correct data and documents saved

title: Vehicle Sale Process with Auto-filled Buyer Information
description: Verify vehicle sale transaction flow auto-fills buyer information when buyer exists and processes sale successfully.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive
Select vehicle from inventory for sale
Enter buyer information for existing customer
Check buyer information fields are auto-filled from CRM
Complete sale transaction and submit
Verify sale record is created and vehicle status updated

title: Finance Module EMI Schedule Management
description: Verify creation, editing, and retrieval of EMI schedules and loan disbursements for vehicles.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Finance & Loan Management module
Create new loan record with EMI schedule
Verify EMI schedule is correctly calculated and displayed
Edit EMI schedule
Check updates are saved and reflected correctly
Retrieve loan and EMI records
Verify accurate retrieval with no data loss

title: CRM Lead Tracking and Status Workflow
description: Verify leads can be created, status updated through defined workflows, and all transitions enforce business rules.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive
Navigate to CRM module and create new lead
Update inquiry status through predefined workflow steps
Verify lead status transitions are valid and correctly reflected
Attempt invalid status transition
Check system prevents invalid status changes and shows appropriate error

title: Mobile KYC Workflow with On-site Validation
description: Verify Mobile KYC workflows with step-by-step verification including camera integration for identity validation.

steps.description: Login as Field Agent using mobile-optimized UI
Start KYC process for a customer
Perform each verification step sequentially
Use camera integration to capture ID documents and customer photos
Verify captured data is stored correctly and linked to customer profile
Complete KYC workflow and confirm status updated

title: File Uploads for Vehicle Documentation
description: Verify that file uploads for vehicle-related documents handle various types, multipart submissions, and no data corruption occurs.

steps.description: Navigate to document upload section in Inventory Management
Upload multiple document types in a multipart request (PDF, images, text files)
Verify all files are uploaded successfully without data loss or corruption
Attempt upload of unsupported file format
Check system rejects unsupported format with appropriate error message

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users cannot access modules or perform actions outside their assigned roles.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive
Attempt to access Admin-only modules such as User Management and Finance Records
Verify access is denied and user is shown an authorization error
Login as Field Agent
Attempt to access sales transaction modules
Access denied and proper message shown

title: Concurrent Multi-User Session Data Consistency
description: Verify system maintains data integrity and consistent views during concurrent access by multiple users.

steps.description: Simulate multiple users logged in concurrently performing inventory updates and sales transactions
Verify no data conflicts or overwrites occur during concurrent operations
Check system performance remains acceptable under load

title: End-to-End Purchase Flow Validation
description: Verify the full vehicle purchase process from selection, validation, financing, to completion functions without errors.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive
Select a vehicle from inventory for purchase
Complete buyer information and financing details
Upload required purchase documents
Submit purchase transaction
Verify purchase transaction completes successfully with valid status updates across modules
Check no failures or data inconsistencies in the workflow

title: Profile Management Updates
description: Verify user can update profile settings, change password, and preferences like Dark/Light mode with persistence.

steps.description: Login as any user
Navigate to profile management page
Update profile fields such as name, email, phone
Change user password correctly
Toggle UI mode between Dark and Light
Save changes
Verify updates are saved and persisted after page reload and new login

title: RTO Management Process Tracking
description: Verify that Regional Transport Office related processes are tracked, updated, and status changes are reflected.

steps.description: Login as Sales Executive or Admin
Navigate to RTO Management module
Create and update RTO process entries for vehicle registrations
Verify status changes propagate correctly and are viewable in related dashboards

title: Authentication Session Management and Security
description: Verify that session handling prevents unauthorized access, enforces logout, and maintains session security.

steps.description: Login as valid user
Perform actions within authenticated session
Logout from the system
Attempt to access authenticated pages post logout
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login
Test session timeout by inactivity
Session expires correctly and requires re-authentication
